channel.title: Webclient problem
channel.description:
Hi, i have uploaded the jar and and the cache.zip
so when i try to open the webclient it says " downloading cache" i wait till it finishes downloading...and it tells me to refresh the client....as i do so it says again "downloading cache".
it keeps saying that also i figured out that this happens because the cache.zip is not extracting..it stays as zip so how can i make it extracts by iteself ?
thanks

item.title: Webclient problem
item.dc:creator: @boypipo boypipo
item.description:
@boypipo wrote:

awww it worked almsot
here can some 1 take a look at it please… :’(
http://ravedclient.webs.com/client.html
its good but when you log in it says loading please wait…and just waits…and waits…then apllet failed with a white screen and a red x at the top left?:S

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient problem
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

Make sure in Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java that you changed the location of each of the spirites, from e.g. ./Cache to whatever you named your folder.

(This happens if you don’t do that.)

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient problem
item.dc:creator: @I_Sora_I I Sora I
item.description:
@I_Sora_I wrote:

Make sure your findcachedir() looks like this

    public static final String findcachedir()
    {
        String s;
        String s1;
        File file;
        s = "C:/.name_of_your_cache_32";
        s1 = "";
        file = new File((new StringBuilder()).append(s1).append(s).toString());
        if(file.exists() || file.mkdir())
        {
            return (new StringBuilder()).append(s1).append(s).append("/").toString();
        }
        return null;
    }

Read full topic
